structure.unit: General Provisions Relative To State Departments, Commissions, Officers And Employees

law.catch_line: Death Away From Home; Return Of Body; Expenses
law.text: If any state officer or member of a department who is allowed actual and reasonable expenses incurred while traveling in the performance of duty, under the provisions of section twenty-five, dies while in the performance of such duty away from home, his body shall be returned to his home at the expense of the commonwealth.
